resources.string: Please upload a copy of your ID, rental/lease agreement and proof of income for validation by the agent.
Please attach any supporting documents relevant to the issue being reported.

Date: August 8, 2025

Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our rental application ('The App').

Information We Collect
- Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, and profile photo when you create an account or make bookings.
- Property & Rental Data: Listings you view, save, or book.
- Location Information: Only with your permission, to improve search results.

How We Use Your Information
- To provide and improve our services.
- To process your bookings and manage your account.
- To send you notifications related to your bookings.

Sharing Your Information
We do not sell your personal information. We only share it with:
- Property owners or managers for bookings.
- Service providers to process payments or deliver features.

Data Security
We use encryption and secure servers to protect your data.

Your Rights
You can update or delete your information in the App at any time.

Contact Us
If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please email: support@rentwise.com
Tracking updates are refreshed in real-time. If an update takes longer than expected, please contact our support team.
